descriptionHtml:
Dispel Light Spell, Ring of Light and Quick Light Spell

v1.1 In Optional Files section adds the ability to disenchant the ring of light and learn the enchantment so you can enchant other items with light.

If you are using an ENB with darker nights and dungeons and rely on stealth to kill your enemies, you may find this mod useful. I always hated casting candlelight to not bump into walls in a dark dungeon, then having no way to put out the light when I stumbled upon an enemy to be able to kill them stealthily.

This mod adds a Dispel Light spell (Alteration school) so that you can quickly put out your magic light to avoid being seen by an enemy.

I also added a Ring of Lanternlight that can quickly be equipped and unequipped for non-mage thief and warrior players.

The other thing I thought was missing was a quick concentration light spell for times when you only need light for a few seconds to search for something.
QuickLanternlight spell has been added as a concentration spell (which means that it is only cast as long as you hold the cast button down similar to Telikinesis or Clairvoyance). This spell has a radius of 1000 (contrasted with the Vanilla Candlelight which has a radius of 450).

Additional light spells were also added with larger light radius. 1. Lanternlight spell has radius 1000 and 2. Firelight spell has radius 1500.

Dwemerlight spell was also added as a targeted spell like Magelight but with a larger radius of 1000.

The light color for all these has also been changed to be more like the Vanilla fire light found in Whiterun streets.

Check out my other mod Nightingale Hood Nighteye http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24454/

Location: These items can be found in a chest in Whiterun in the back of Jorrvaskr. See screenshot for location.

Works best with Project ENB http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20781
